flawed_nl_solution:
On the way to the library, Trent went 4 blocks + 7 blocks = <<4+7=9>>9 blocks.
Trent came home the same way so he went 9 blocks + 9 blocks = <<9+9=18>>18 blocks.
#### 18

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 11, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
